page.title: 18ELY FESTIVAL 2
page.content: there was a high wire act on a motor bike there was someone on the bottom of the bike doing stunts.There was also exercising in the Health Centre and there were fun runs for all ages and in the Leisure Centre there was a special day you could get in for 15 pence and you could do all the things like squash,badminton,and tennis and so on.There was a BMX competition in the week.There was also a jazz band called the Red Coats up Careau field. On Saturday there was 17 floats going round Ely.I was on one of them for the Youth Centre.They went down Heol Trelai turned left into the shops down Bishopston Road until they got to Amroth Road to Cowbridge Road down Cowbridge Road turned left into Grand Avenue, then they went back the same way.
